title: Introducing Sceptre Journeys
text:
Sceptre
Sceptre Journeys launches with exciting new destinations
ROCKVILLE CENTRE, N.Y. , Oct. 13, Sceptre announces the launch of Sceptre Journeys, its new, premium small-group guided tours. Travelers can book these customized vacations by contacting Sceptre's travel consultants or visiting Sceptrevacations.com . These small-group tours not only offer new destinations that may be combined or visited separately, but create a unique and very individual travel experience.
Sceptre Journeys introduces five new destinations to Sceptre's growing European portfolio. Travelers now have the opportunity to book a trip to Austria , Germany , Switzerland , Greece and Iceland . With a maximum of 16 passengers, these brand new Journeys feature classic itineraries, must-see attractions, immersive culinary experiences and ideally located accommodations. Most important, all Sceptre Journeys offer guaranteed departures.
A seven-day Journey to Germany , priced from $2,999 , includes entrance to the Friedrichsbad Baths, a 3-hour boat ride on the Danube River, an authentic Bavarian dinner with live entertainment and a guided tour of Neuschwanstein and Linderhof Castles. All Sceptre Journeys include private round-trip airport transfers, services of a professional driver/guide and free time to explore at a leisurely pace. The new small-group guided tours contain classic sightseeing and the ability for travelers to step off the beaten path and create their own unique experiences.
To celebrate, Sceptre is offering an exclusive 2-for-1 air sale deal on all Sceptre Journeys booked by December 31, 2015 . Travelers are encouraged to "make it your own" by combining different Sceptre Journeys or by extending their European vacation. The discount applies to all departures from June 1, 2016 to August 31, 2016 . While booking in the call center, travelers must mention the promo code '2FOR1AIR' in order to receive the deal.
About Sceptre
Sceptre designs innovative and unique travel experiences for the discerning vacationer. From expertly designed pre-packaged vacations to unique customizable travel experiences, Sceptre's Vacation Consultants are committed to earning their clients' trust one vacation at a time. With more than 30 years of experience, Sceptre offers a winning combination of unique and upscale travel experiences, in-depth destination knowledge, and unmatched customer service. Visit Sceptrevacations.com for more information or to book your next Sceptre vacation.
